title: Tin Foil Hat #68: The Curious Case Of Mike Ward
description: Thanks for tuning into another fun festive episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode Ryan and Sam welcome Canadian comics Mike Ward and Abdul Butt to the show to discuss Mike Ward's freedom of speech trial in front of Quebec’s Human Rights Tribunal in Canada.  It's getting fucking crazy out there for comics! Thank you for all of your support!
